column2: "Na Nebukadenezar n’ahendzi afe a otsia ebien no mu no
column3: na Nebukadenezar sosoo adaa; na no werɛ howee
column4: na ne nda fii no do kɔree."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no hyɛɛ dɛ wɔnkɛfrɛ nkongyaayifo
column3: na nkaberkyerfo
column4: na abayifo
column5: na Kaldeafo dɛ wɔmbɛkyerɛ ɔhen n’adaaso no. Nna wɔbae begyinagyinaa ɔhen no enyim."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see hɔn dɛ
column3: Maso daa bi
column4: na moho hiahia me dɛ mebɛkaa daa no na mehu ne nkyerɛase."

column2: "Nna Kaldeafo no kasaa kyerɛɛ ɔhen no wɔ Siria kasa mu
column3: dɛ
column4: Ɔhen nya nkwa daa; ka daa no kyerɛ wo nkowaa

column2: "Ɔhen no buae see Kaldeafo no dɛ
column3: Dza maka no ara na maka: sɛ hom annkyerɛ me daa no na n’ase a
column4: wobotwitwa hom mu esinesin

column2: "Na sɛ hom kyerɛ daa no na n’ase a
column3: hom benya mo hɔ akyɛdze na akatua na enyidzi kɛse: dɛm ntsi hom nkyerɛ me daa no na n’ase."

column2: "Wobuaa no mpɛn ebien see dɛ
column3: Ma ɔhen nka daa no nkyerɛ no nkowaa
column4: ma yɛnkyerɛ ase."

column2: "Ɔhen no buae see dɛ
column3: Muhu no pefee dɛ mber ara na hom regye
column4: osiandɛ hom nyim dɛ sɛ mekasa a menndan m’ano."

column2: "Na sɛ hom amma mennhu daa no a
column3: ɔno adze bɛyɛ hom: osiandɛ hom ahyehyɛ atorsɛm na nsɛmfun dɛ hom rebɛka no m’enyim
column4: ekodu dɛ mebɛsakyer m’adwen: dɛm ntsi hom nka daa no nkyerɛ me
column5: ma munhu dɛ hom botum akyerɛ me ase."

column2: "Kaldeafo no buae wɔ ɔhen no enyim see dɛ
column3: Nyimpa biara nnyi asaase do a obotum akyerɛ ɔhen n’asɛm yi: siantsir nye dɛ ɔhen
column4: owura
column7: anaa Kaldeanyi biara hɔ asɛm a ɔtse dɛm pɛn."

column2: "Na asɛm a ɔyɛ dzen na ɔhen ribisa yi
column3: na obiara nnyi hɔ a obotum akyerɛ wɔ ɔhen enyim
column4: gyedɛ abosom a hɔn tsenabea nnyi adasa mu no."

column2: "Iyi ntsi na ɔhen no no bo fuwii na n’enyi beer kɛse
column3: na ɔhyɛɛ dɛ wonku Babilɔn enyansafo no nyinara."

column2: "Nna wɔhyɛɛ mbra dɛ wonku enyansafo no; na wɔhwehwɛɛ Daniel na ne n’anyɛnkofo no dɛ woboku hɔn."
"Nna Daniel dze kasa pa na adwenmutsewee bisaa ɔhen ne safohen Ariok a nna oepue dɛ orukoku Babilɔn enyansafo no dɛ;"
"Ɔyɛ dɛn na mbra a ɔyɛ dzen dɛm fi ɔhen no hɔ yi? Nna Ariok kaa asɛm no kyerɛɛ Daniel."
"Na Daniel kɔr dan mu kɛserɛɛ ɔhen no dɛ ɔmma no ber
column3: na ɔbɛkyerɛ daa no ase akyerɛ no."

column2: "Nna Daniel kɔr ne fie
column3: na ɔkɛdaa nsɛm no edzi kyerɛɛ ne mfɛfo Hanania
column4: Misael

column2: "dɛ wɔnserɛ ɔsor Nyankopɔn hɔ mbɔbɔrhu wɔ esumasɛm yi ho; amma woeennkuku Daniel na n’anyɛnkofo no aannka Babilɔn enyansafo nkaa no ho."
"Na woyii esumasɛm no kyerɛɛ Daniel wɔ anadwe enyido adzehu mu. Nna Daniel hyiraa ɔsor Nyankopɔn."
"Daniel kaa dɛ
column3: Nhyira nka Nyankopɔn dzin daa daa: Ɔno na nyansa na tum dzi wɔ no:"

column2: "Na ɔno na ɔsakyer mber na hyɛber: Otu ahen
column3: na ɔhyɛ ahen: Ɔma enyansafo nyansa
column4: Na hɔn a wɔwɔ ntseasee no

column2: "Ɔda ndzɛmba a no mu dɔ na osuma edzi: Onyim dza ɔwɔ sum mu
column3: na kan nye no tse."

column2: "Meda wo ase
column3: miyi wo ayɛw
column4: Ɔwo
column7: Na afei ama mehu dza yebisaa wo no: Na ɔwo na ama yeehu ɔhen no n’adaaso."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Daniel kɔr Ariok a ɔhen no ahyɛ no dɛ onku Babilɔn enyansafo no nkyɛn: kɛsee no dɛ: Mma nnsɛɛ Babilɔn enyansafo no: fa me kɔ ɔhen no enyim
column3: na mebɛkyerɛ daa no ase akyerɛ no."

column2: "Nna Ariok yɛɛ ntsɛm dze Daniel baa ɔhen no enyim
column3: na mbrɛ ɔsee nye yi
column4: Mehu Juda ndɔmmumkɔfo no mu banyin bi a ɔbɛma ɔhen ehu daa no na nkyerɛase no."

column2: "Ɔhen no buae see Daniel a ne dzin dze Bɛltesasar no dɛ
column3: Ana ɔwo ibotum ama mehu daa a maso no
column4: na ne nkyerɛase no?"

column2: "Daniel buaa ɔhen no see dɛ
column3: Esumasɛm a ɔhen ebisa yi enyansafo
column4: nkaberkyerfo

column2: "na mbom Nyankopɔn bi wɔ sor a ɔda esumadze edzi
column3: na ɔno na ɔama ɔhen Nebukadenezar ehu dza daakye ɔbɛba no. Wo daa no
column4: na w’enyido adzehu wɔ wo mpa do no

column2: "ɔwo
column3: ɔhen
column4: eda wo mpa do no
column6: na dza daakye ɔbɛba no: na nyia ɔda esumadze edzi no eyi akyerɛ wo no."

column2: "Na emi dze
column3: nnyɛ nyansa biara a mowɔ kyɛn atseasefo nyina ntsi na woeyi esumasɛm yi akyerɛ me
column4: na mbom mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a wɔbɛma ɔhen ehu nkyerɛase no
column5: na ɔwoara ehu w’akoma mu nsusui ntsi a."

column2: "Ɔwo
column3: ɔhen
column4: ihun ohonyi kɛse bi. Ohonyi yi a ɔso
column6: begyinaa w’enyim; nna n’enyim yɛ hu."

column2: "Ohonyi yi dze
column3: ne tsir yɛ sika pa
column4: n’akoko na n’abasa dwetɛ a
column5: ne yafun na n’aserɛ boran a
column8: n’anansa dadze fa na dɛtse fa."

column2: "Ehwɛe araa kodur dɛ ɔbo bi a wɔnndze nsa twae tsewee bɔhwee ohonyi no n’anansa a ɔyɛ dadze na dɛtse no do
column3: na obubuu no pɔsɔpɔsɔ."

column2: "Nna dadze
column3: dɛtse
column4: boran
column6: na sika no bɔɔ mu bubuu pɔsɔpɔsɔ dɛ ɔpɛber mu ewuporowee ntsɛw; na mframa soaa hɔn nyina kɔree
column7: dɛ woennhu hɔn beebiara bio: na ɔbo a ɔbɔbɔɔ ohonyi no do no
column9: na ɔhyɛɛ asaase nyina do ma."

column2: "Iyi nye adaaso no; na yɛbɛka ne nkyerɛase no so wɔ ɔhen enyim."
"Ɔwo
column3: ɔhen
column4: eyɛ ahemfo hen a ɔsor Nyankopɔn dze ahendzi

column2: "na beebiara mbrɛ adasamba
column3: hambowa
column4: na ɔsor ntumbowa wowɔe no
column6: na ɔahyɛ wo dɛ dzi hɔn nyinara do tum: ɔhen

column2: "Na ɔwo w’ekyir na ahendzi fofor bi so bɔsoɛr a ɔnnto wodze: na ahendzi bi so a otsia ebiasa a ɔyɛ boran dze a
column3: obedzi asaase nyina do tum."

column2: "Na ahendzi a otsia anan no bɛyɛ dzen dɛ dadze: susuampa dɛ dadze bubu adze nyinara pɔsɔpɔsɔ na ɔbrɛ no adze no: dɛmara na obobubu pɔsɔpɔsɔ na ɔadwerew iyinom nyinara."
"Na dɛ mbrɛ ihun anansa na anansɔba dɛ fa yɛ ɔwemfo dɛtse na fa so yɛ dadze no
column3: ahendzi no mu bɛpaapaa; na mbom dadze dzenyɛ bɛba mu hɔ
column4: susuampa dɛ ihun dɛ wɔdze dadze afora awendɛtse mu ntsi."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ anansɔba no mu bi yɛ dadze
column3: na bi so yɛ awendɛtse no
column4: dɛmara so na ahendzi no mu fa bɛyɛ dzen

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ ihun dɛ wɔdze dadze afora awendɛtse mu no
column3: wɔdze hɔn ho bɔfora adasa asefo mu; na wɔremmfemfam hɔnho
column4: dɛ mbrɛ dadze nnye awendɛtse nndzi afora no."

column2: "Na ahemfo no hɔn nda no mu na ɔsor Nyankopɔn bɛma ahendzi a wɔrennsɛɛ no da
column3: eso wɔrenndan n’ahendzi nngya ɔman fofor bi do; na obobu ahendzi yinom pɔsɔpɔsɔ na ɔama ɔasa
column4: na ɔnodze begyina daa."

column2: "Susuampa dɛ ihun ɔbo bi a wɔnndze nsa twae fii bepɔw no mu tsewee
column3: na obobubuu dadze no
column4: boran
column7: na sika no pɔsɔpɔsɔ no: Nyankopɔn kɛse no ama ɔhen ehu dza daakye ɔbɛba: na daa no yɛ nokwar
column8: na ne nkyerɛase no si pi."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Nebukadenezar dze n’enyim boom famu
column3: na ɔkotowee sɔɔr Daniel
column4: na ɔhyɛɛ dɛ wɔmbɔ Daniel ayɛyɛdze afɔr na nduhuam afɔr."

column2: "Ɔhen no see Daniel dɛ
column3: Ampaara wo Nyankopɔn nye enyame mu Onyame
column4: na ahemfo Wura
column6: ɔnam dɛ ɔwo na etum ada esumasɛm yi edzi."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no yɛɛ Daniel ɔkɛse
column3: na ɔmaa no akyɛdze akɛse pii
column4: na ɔmaa odzii tum wɔ Babilɔn asaase nyinara do
column5: na ɔbɛyɛɛ ambrado tsitsir wɔ Babilɔn enyansafo nyinara do."

column2: "Na Daniel serɛɛ ɔhen no ma ɔyɛɛ Sadrak
column3: Mesak
column4: na Abednego Babilɔn asaase mu nsɛm do ahwɛfo: na Daniel dze
